textParagraphs: I'm Diego Rojas, be welcome!. Peruvian, 28 years old, code, rock and dog lover. Currently located in Sao Paulo, with heart located in Peru and mind in the stars. Passionate for technology, i consider learning and teaching are two complementary parts of the same coin. Good team player.

Not only focused on technology. I had the luck to work with multidisciplinary teams learning best practices about each area in the software development process, since the product idea, discovery strategies, coding, test and deploy in production. Feedback is the main tool to build better products, then, the cycle starts again.

The last 2 years i put more effort understanding how the systems can scale in a fast, reliable and
              secure way. It allowed me to work as an SRE with strong product background, targeting the real needs of
              the engineering team and implementing a Cybersecurity strategy for the infrastructure.

sliderElements.textTitle: Hands On: Full-stack development with Aurelia!
sliderElements.textDescription:
My first book released along with my friend
                    Erikson Murrugarra. This is our first commercial book based on an
                    alternative MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, Aurelia and Node). Find more info
How we stop depending on a particular cloud provider to write and deploy our serverless functions.

sliderElements.textTitle: How tracing has become our key factor for fast error detection
sliderElements.textDescription: Jaeger implementation for our distributed services. One annotation will trace everything you need.

sliderElements.textTitle: Coronavirus: The Hammer and the Dance
sliderElements.textDescription:
Spanish translation from Tomas Pueyo's article about current infection statistics and how we could fight
                    against this invisible enemy.

sliderElements.textTitle: Feign: Resilience and scalability for your rest clients
sliderElements.textDescription:
Step by step guide about how to implement synchronous API calls using fallback/retry patterns to
                    improve resilience and fast failure recovery.

sliderElements.textTitle: Rethinking microservices: Process, rules, and scalability
sliderElements.textDescription:
Explore an alternative way to develop micro-services, decoupling core services from application
                    layer, improving scalability and resilience.

textParagraphs: Not all in my life is work and study. I like do distribute my time with my second passion too: Music, more specific, play guitar. I'm a 80's, 90's rock lover, follower of great bands such Guns N Roses, Aerosmith, Led Zeppelin, Audioslave, and maybe the list wont finish soon...
I love shooter games, Battlefield is my favorite one. Call of Duty mobile is a great option too. Add me as @PerriPerri
